thread.title: Maxim Integrated To Present At Upcoming Investor Conferences
thread.title_full: Maxim Integrated To Present At Upcoming Investor Conferences

author: admin
title: Maxim Integrated To Present At Upcoming Investor Conferences
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: Maxim Integrated Products, Inc. 
SAN JOSE, Calif., Oct. 26, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Maxim Integrated Products, Inc. (NASDAQ:MXIM) announced today that Chief Financial Officer Bruce Kiddoo will be presenting at the 2(nd) Annual Bernstein Technology Innovation Summit in San Francisco. The presentation is scheduled to begin at 1:15pm Pacific Time on Thursday, November 5, 2015. Interested parties can listen to a live audio webcast at http://www.maximintegrated.com/BernsteinTech2015 . A replay of the audio webcast will be available for 180 days at the same location. 
http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnvar/20120912/SF71654LOGO 
The Company also announced today that Chief Executive Officer Tunc Doluca and Chief Financial Officer Bruce Kiddoo will be presenting at the Credit Suisse 19(th) Annual Technology, Media & Telecom Conference in Scottsdale, Arizona. The presentation is scheduled to begin at 4:00pm Mountain Time on Tuesday, December 1, 2015. Interested parties unable to attend the conference can listen to a live audio webcast at http://www.maximintegrated.com/CreditSuisseTech2015 . A replay of the audio webcast will be available for 180 days at the same location. 
Additionally, the company announced today that Chief Financial Officer Bruce Kiddoo will be presenting at the Barclays Global Technology, Media and Telecommunications Conference in San Francisco, California. The presentation is scheduled to begin at 2:50pm Pacific Time on Tuesday, December 8, 2015. Interested parties unable to attend the conference can listen to a live audio webcast at http://www.maximintegrated.com/BarclaysGlobalTMT2015 . A replay of the audio webcast will be available for 180 days at the same location. 
About Maxim Integrated Maxim is bringing new levels of analog integration to automotive, cloud data center, mobile consumer, and industrial applications. We're making technology smaller, smarter, and more energy efficient, so that our customers can meet the demands of an integrated world. Learn more at http://www.maximintegrated.com .
